title: [Large-scale] Strategies for Facilitating Learning Processes Using Artificial Intelligence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of educational planning
context.additional_context: AI-integrated instructional design for strengthening social sector competencies among managers/leaders

learning_goals: Explain the three-stage structure (micro, meso, macro) of integrated learning theory models and analyze AI application cases for each stage
Select five strategies from 14 AI roles suitable for organizational leaders and apply them to actual educational scenarios
Understand learning data aggregation/distribution mechanisms and operate AI tools for learning outcome evaluation in LMS environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
